original: (vi, ka) uddeśeti---guṇaālaṅkārarītaya ityuddeśe 'laṅkārasya prāguddiṣṭatvena tadullaṅghayam ityarthaḥ /

original: (lo, a) idānīṃ rītiṃ nirūpayitukāmaḥ saṃgati karoti---athoddeśeti /

original: (lo, ā) padānāṃ saṅgaṭanā racanā arthāt viśiṣṭā,

original: svalpaprāṇāni akṣarāṇi īṣat prayatnoccāryyāpi kakārahakārādīni yatra /

ojaḥ bandhaḥ āḍambaraḥ punar
samāsa bahulā gauḍī

yathā
madhurayā madhu bodhita mādhavī madhu samṛddhi samedhita medhayā

original: madhukarāṅganayā bhramaryyā nibhṛtākṣaraṃ guptākṣaramasphuṭākṣaraṃ yathā syāttathā muhurujjage 'gīyata /

original: tathā madhunā vasantena bodhitāyā udvodhitāyā mādhavīlatāyā madhuno makarandasya samṛddhyā sampattyā samedhitā dīptā medhā buddhiryasyāstādṛśyā
analyzed: tathā madhunā vasantena bodhitāyāḥ udvodhitāyāḥ mādhavī latāyāḥ madhunaḥ makarandasya samṛddhyā sampattyā samedhitā dīptā medhā buddhiḥ yasyāḥ tādṛśyā
tathā unmada dvani bhṛtā ucca tvam eva unmada tvam
atra makāra nakārau pañcama varṇau samāsa gatau
bhojaḥ tu āha
samasta pañca ṣa padām ojaḥ kānti samanvitām

original: madhurāṃ sukumārāṃ ca pāñcālīṃ kavayo viduḥ” //
analyzed: madhurām sukumārām ca pāñcālīm kavayaḥ viduḥ
vijña priyā
vi kaṇṭhāraṇa kṛtaḥ bhojasya sampata lakṣaṇam āha bhojaḥ tu iti

original: sābhiprāyatvarūpeṇa ojasā aujjvalyarūpayā kāntvā ca samanvitāmityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sa abhiprāya tva rūpeṇa ojasā aujjvalya rūpayā kāntvā ca samanvitām iti arthaḥ
madhura aṃsu kumārām ca iti

original: pṛthak padatvarūpeṇa mādhuryyeṇa saukumāryeṇa ca yuktāmityarthaḥ /
analyzed: pṛthak pada tva rūpeṇa mādhuryeṇa saukumāryeṇa ca yuktām iti arthaḥ

original: anaṅgamaṅgalabhuva iti vaidarbhyudāharaṇe pañcamamūrddhāna eva varṇā iti /
analyzed: anaṅga maṅgala bhuvaḥ iti vaidarbhī udāharaṇe pañcama mūrddhānaḥ eva varṇāḥ iti
na tatra samasta pañcama varṇa ghaṭita pāñcālī tva prasaktiḥ

original: madhurayetyādipāñcālyudāharaṇe samāsagatā eva pañcamavarṇā iti na tatra pañcamamūrddhavarṇaghaṭitavaidarbhotvaprasaktiḥ /
analyzed: madhurayā ityādi pāñcālī udāharaṇe samāsa gatāḥ eva pañcama varṇāḥ iti na tatra pañcama mūrddha varṇa ghaṭita vaidarbhī tva prasaktiḥ

original: tatra mādhuryyavyañjakairityatra bahuvacanādatra madhukarāṅganayā ityatra tadvyañjakaikavarṇamātrasattvena tatprasaktyabhāvāt /

locanā
ojaḥ kāntī tad mata uktau guṇa viśeṣau

original: (lo, ū) antarā sthitetyanena nātyalpasamāsā na bahulasamāsā,

yathā
ayam udayati mudrā bhañjanaḥ padminīnām udayagiri vanālī bāla mandāra puṣpam
viraha vidhura koka dvandva bandhu vibhindan kupita kapi kapola kroḍa tāmraḥ tamāṃsi
vijña priyā
vi ja ayam udayati iti
lāṭī udāharaṇe tad ubhaya miśraṇam darśayiṣyate
tad arthaḥ tu ayam arthāt sūryaḥ udayati
kīdṛśaḥ
padminīnām mudrāyāḥ saṅkocasya bhañjanaḥ tad puṣpa vikāśa kara tvāt
tathā udayagiri sthāyāḥ vana śreṇyāḥ navīna mandāra puṣpa svarūpaḥ
viraha duḥ khitasya cakravāka mithunasya bandhuḥ mitram tad viraha nāśaka tvāt

original: tamāṃsi bhindan ca kupitasya vānarasya kapolakroḍobhayavat tāmraśca /
analyzed: tamāṃsi bhindan ca kupitasya vānarasya kapola kroḍa ubhaya vat tāmraḥ ca

original: kopaśāt kapolasya tāmratā kroḍasya tu svābhāvikī /
analyzed: kopaśāt kapolasya tāmra tā kroḍasya tu svābhāvikī
atra bhañjana iti
mandāra iti
dvandva bandhuḥ iti

ucita viśeṣaṇa pūrita vastu nyāsā bhavet lāṭī

yuktaiḥ saṃyuktaiḥ varṇaiḥ na ca ati bhūyiṣṭhā
bhūyiṣṭha saṃyukta varṇa rahitā iti arthaḥ

original: uciteti---ucitam uktadoṣarahitaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ pūritam pratipālitaṃ yena tādṛśasya vastuno nyāsayuktā lāṭī bhavedityarthaḥ /

etat api ukta udāharaṇe eva sambhavati

anye tu āhuḥ
gauḍī ḍambara baddhā syāt vaidarbhaḥ lalita kramā

original: pāñcālī miśrabhāvena lāṭī tu mṛdubhaiḥ padaiḥ” //
analyzed: pāñcālī miśra bhāvena lāṭī tu mṛdubhaiḥ padaiḥ

original: (vi, ña) kvacittattadrasābhāvena tadguṇavyañjanārthamanupādeyatve 'pi vaktrādyaucityād anyathā racanādaya ityāha---kvacidvaktrādīti /
analyzed: vi kvacid tad tad rasa abhāvena tad guṇa vyañjana artham anupādeya tve vaktra ādi aucityāt anyathā racanā ādayaḥ iti āha kvacid vaktra ādi iti
tad guṇa vyañjana abhāve tad nibandhe evā anyathātvam

iha saṅghaṭana ādīnām guṇa paratantra tve pi viśeṣam āha kvacid iti

original: yadāha sarvatraiva rasāśritā racanādayo vaktrādyapekṣāyāṃ tu kiñcittarātamyamiti /

vāc tradi ityādi śabdāt vācya prabandhau racanā ādi ityādi śabdāt vṛtti varṇau

mantha āyasta arṇava ambhaḥ pluta kuhara calat mandara dhvāna dhaīraḥ koṇa āghāteṣu garjat pralaya ghana ghaṭa anyonya saṅghaṭṭa caṇḍaḥ
kṛṣṇa a krodha graḍhūtaḥ kuru kula nidhana utpāta nirghāta vātaḥ kena asmad siṃhanāda pratirasita sakhaḥ dundubhiḥ tāḍitaḥ yam
atra vācya krodha ādi ana
bhivyañjaka tve pi bhīmasena vakta tvena uddhatāḥ racanā ādayaḥ

original: (vi, ṭa) manthāyastetyādi---raṇasthale dundubhiśabdaṃ śrutvā bhīmasyeyaṃ pṛcchā /

kena ayam dundubhiḥ tāḍitaḥ tāḍanena janitaḥ
yathā śrute viśeṣaṇānām dundubhau anvayaḥ

original: manthanena mathanena āyastasya prāptāyāsasyārṇavasyāmbhasāpulutaṃ vyāptaṃ kuharaṃ guhā yasya tādṛśasya calataḥ mandarasya dhvānavat dhīraḥ

garjjantyāḥ pralaya ghana ghaṭāyāḥ anyaḥ nya saṃghaṭṭanena caṇḍaḥ
yat vā ḍhakkā śata sahastrāṇi bherī śata śatāni ca

original: ekadā yatra vādyante koṇāghātaḥ sa ucyate //
analyzed: ekadā yatra vādyante koṇāghātaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: yatreti nimittasaptamyāṃ yādṛśaśabdanimittaṃ ḍhakkādaya ekadā tāḍyante sa śabdaḥ koṇaāghāta ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yatra iti nimitta saptamyām yādṛśa śabda nimittam ḍhakka ādayaḥ ekadā tāḍyante sa śabdaḥ koṇaāghātaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tathā ca tādṛśaśabdeṣu madhye ayaṃ garjjat ityādi caṇḍa ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca tādṛśa śabdeṣu madhye ayam garjjat ityādi caṇḍaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: kṛṣṇāyā draupadyāḥ krodhasya agradūtaḥ tatpravarttakatvāt kurukulanidhanasūcaka utpātabhūto nirghātavātaśca ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇāyāḥ draupadyāḥ krodhasya agra dūtaḥ tad pravarttaka tvāt kuru kula nidhana sūcakaḥ utpāta bhūtaḥ nirghāta vātaḥ ca iti arthaḥ

original: atreti vācyapadamatra pratipādyaparaṃ tathā ca lakṣyasya dundubhiśabdasya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atra iti vācya padam atra pratipādya param tathā ca lakṣyasya dundubhi śabdasya iti arthaḥ

original: (lo, ḷ) manthāyastetyādau kodhāvyañjakatvaṃ vākyasya ca nāṭakarūpasyābhineyaduḥ- khāvahatvāt /
analyzed: mantha āyasta ityādau kodha avyañjaka tvam vākyasya ca nāṭaka rūpasya abhineya duḥ kha āvaha tvāt

original: anucitamapi dīrghasamāsāntatve 'pi viśeṣamāha---dhīroddhato bhīmaseno vakteti nānaucityamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: anucitam api dīrgha samāsa anta tve pi viśeṣam āha dhīra uddhataḥ bhīmasenaḥ vaktā iti na anaucityam iti bhāvaḥ
vācya aucityāt yathā udāhṛte mūrdha vyādhūyamānaḥ ityādau
locanā
mūrddha vyādhūyamāna ityādau ca na vaktṛ aucityam
nāṭaka antar pāti tvāt ca ukta prakāreṇa prabandha aucityam api
kintu kāvyasya uddhata artha prakāśaka tvāt uddhata racanā
prabandha aucityāt yathā nāṭaka ādau raudre pi abhinaya pratikūla tvena na dīrghasamāsa ādayaḥ
evam ākhyāyikāyām śṛṅgāre na masṛṇa varṇa ādayaḥ
kathāyām raudre pi na atyantam uddhatāḥ
vijña priyā
vi ṭhaḥ ākhyāyikā kathe prabandha viśeṣau
iti śrī maheśvara nyāyālaṅkāra bhaṭṭa ācāryya kṛtāyām sāhityadarpaṇa ṭīkāyām rīti nirūpaṇa khyasya navama paricchedasya vivaraṇam
evam anyat api jñeyam
locanā
ākhyāyikā ādi lakṣaṇam uktam eva

original: ākhyāyikāyā gadyamayaprabandhatvenagadyasya ca vikaṭabandhadīrghasamāsabahulaprācuryyautityāt tatra śṛṅgāre 'pi na prāyeṇa sukumāraracanādiḥ
analyzed: ākhyāyikāyāḥ gadya maya prabandha tvena gadyasya ca vikaṭa bandha dīrgha samāsa bahula prācuryya autityāt tatra śṛṅgāre na prāyeṇa su kumāra racanā ādiḥ
yat uktam dhvanikṛtā rasa baddha uktam aucityam bhāti sarvatra saṃśritā
racanā viṣaya apekṣam tat tu kiñcid vibheda vat

original: iti kathāprabandhasya gadyamayatve 'pi śṛṅgārarasamayatvādraudādirasapraveśe 'pi nātyantamuddhataracanādayo vidheyāḥ /
analyzed: iti kathā prabandhasya gadya maya tve pi śṛṅgāra rasa maya tvāt raudra ādi rasa praveśe pi na atyantam uddhata racanā ādayaḥ vidheyāḥ
evam anyat api

original: yaduktaṃ dhvanikṛtā---“sandānikādiṣu vikaṭabandhaucityād madhyamasamāsadīrgharamāse eva saṅghaṭane” /
analyzed: yat uktam dhvani kṛta āsandānikā ādiṣu vikaṭa bandha aucityāt madhyama samāsa dīrgha ra māse eva saṅghaṭane

original: iti śrīsāhityadarpaṇalocane rītiviveko nāma navamaḥ paricchedaḥ /
analyzed: iti śrī sāhityadarpaṇa locane rītivivekaḥ nāma navamaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: iti sāhityādarpaṇe rītivivecano nāma navamaḥ paricchedaḥ /
analyzed: iti sāhityādarpaṇe rītivivecanaḥ nāma navamaḥ paricchedaḥ
